name: Haunted Condo
description:
"Well, I've had the key for some time now... never dared to use it, though -- not while the old man was alive. That dirty old bastard always gave me the creeps. They say he was some sort of hoodoo-maker."

- - - - - - -

A short demo by guilleDCF 

Made with CopperCube. PC only.
